ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor looked up from her work as she heard Prowl, she sighed as she then stood up. She hated to see a bot like that, you tell a bot that they did well

* Iron Raptor looked up from her work as she heard Prowl, she sighed as she 
then stood up. She hated to see a bot like that, you tell a bot that they 
did well and they just say the exact opposite.
But she couldn't stop them from thinking what they wished to think, she had 
thought that they had fought well...but maybe she was lying to herself?
Iron Raptor slammed her fist on the damaged control board, slag! Prowl was 
right, she had just said that so that it would maybe lighten their moods but 
now she knew better then that! Try and help a bot and it just blows up in 
her face!
Iron Raptor growled at that but then put it away from her mind, half the 
reason why they had failed was because the Ark couldn't hold up the power 
long enough. She had to find a way to get it up and more powerful so that it 
would last longer, and it needed more defensive weaponry. But how was she 
going to do that?
Iron Raptor sighed as she then turned to a control table that just happened 
to be spared by the Predacons, she brought up a 3D image  and cross-section 
of the Predacon and Maximal bases. There had to be a way to do what she 
thought, to increase their likelihood to win in the next battle.
She looked over the bases carefully and with precision, there had to be 
a...WAIT!
Iron Raptor glared at the Predacon base for a moment, that was just it!
The Predacon base! They had a defence system and it seemed to be going even 
better then the Arks, perhaps it would be wise to just see how better it 
was...by taking it!
Just as the Maximals were damaged, so were the Predacons. They couldn't be 
watching their back all of the time!
Iron Raptor brought up a cross-section and circuit relay map of the 
Predacon's defence system, she looked over the components and smiled to 
herself. It was almost identical to the Arks, thus, it could be loaded onto 
it and increase the defence system's power!
She glanced over at Teltoli for a moment then back at the screen, the first 
thing that she needed was to recheck everything, second she needed a spy 
brave enough to go and check out the Predacon base...by scanning it at close 
range and getting better readings, third she would need a party to go and 
retrieve the defence system, fourth she would need somebot to load it into 
the Ark, and fifth she would need to try it out to see if it worked.
But almost every step involved her, she would check everything, she would 
spy on the Preds, she would help retrieve it, she would help load it into 
the base, and she would help test it out. A busy way of life but if she 
could upgrade the ark then it could be worth it. Or even just copy the 
Predacon defence system, that way she only needed to sent a party there for 
back-up and not have to bother with all of those steps.
That was it!
Forget the last plan, just copy it and load it into the Ark!
Iron Raptor smiled to herself, all she needed then was about 5 able bodied 
bots to go to the Pred base while 2 out of that 5 snuck inside and copied 
their defence program.
It just might work!
Iron Raptor sighed again and stood away from the screen, but first her 
people needed to repair and rest...then she would put this new plan forward 
and see if they approved.
If not...well, she didn't know.*
